The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 November is 1,174,979 (2,087.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 10 November, there were 148,812 new confirmed cases (264.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 November, there were 137,695 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 8% ( 11,117 extra cases).
